tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE student_assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  assignment_description TEXT,
  submission_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE students (
    student_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_name VARCHAR(100),
    student_grade VARCHAR(10),
    assignment_id SERIAL,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(100),
    assignment_grade VARCHAR(10),
    feedback TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE teachers (
    teacher_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    teacher_name VARCHAR(100),
    assignment_id SERIAL,
    student_id SERIAL,
    grade_given VARCHAR(10),
    feedback_given TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
  assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  student_id INT,
  teacher_id INT,
  assignment_name VARCHAR(255),
  deadline DATE
);
CREATE TABLE Students ( student_id INT PRIMARY KEY, student_name VARCHAR(50) );
CREATE TABLE Assignments ( assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, assignment_name VARCHAR(50), due_date DATE, student_id INT REFERENCES Students(student_id) );
CREATE TABLE Grades ( grade_id INT PRIMARY KEY, grade_value FLOAT, assignment_id INT REFERENCES Assignments(assignment_id) );
CREATE TABLE Feedback ( feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, feedback_text TEXT, assignment_id INT REFERENCES Assignments(assignment_id) );

CREATE TABLE Feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INTEGER REFERENCES Students(student_id),
    teacher_id INTEGER REFERENCES Teachers(teacher_id),
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date TIMESTAMP
);
